scripts.build-react: npm run build-shared-js && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] react/src/js/main.js -o react/target/js/main.js
scripts.build-react-prod: npm run build-shared-js && browserify react/src/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -d -p [minifyify --map react/target/js/main.js.map --output react/target/js/main.js.map] > react/target/js/main.js
scripts.build: npm run build-less && npm run build-shared-js && npm run build-aurelia && npm run build-react && npm run build-angular
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-less && npm run build-shared-js && npm run build-aurelia-prod && npm run build-react-prod && npm run build-angular-prod
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start-server
scripts.start-prod: npm run build-prod && npm run start-server
scripts.start-prod-forever: npm run build-prod && forever start -c "npm run start-server" ./
